entry.title: My First Post
entry.summary: Welcome to my new blog! This is my first post using the Hugo static site generator. I’ll be posting more content here soon.
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog! This is my first post using the Hugo static site generator.

I’ll be posting more content here soon.
